welcome.title: Welcome to OSBuilder!

iso.title: ISO Image
iso.description: Select the source ISO or IMG file.

deb.title: DEB Packages
deb.description: Select a folder containing .deb packages to install.

logo.title: Custom Logo
logo.description: Select a custom logo file (PNG, JPG, SVG).

driver.title: Drivers
driver.description: Select a folder containing driver files.

pre_script.title: Pre-execution Script
pre_script.description: Select a script to run before the build.

autostart.title: Autostart Services
autostart.description: Select a folder with service definition files.

other.title: Other Files
other.description: Select a folder with other files to include.

boot_device.description: Select the target boot device (e.g., /dev/sdb). DANGER: This will format the device.
